articles.title: UP expressway CCTV scandal: 3 arrested over couples' private videos,Â blackmail
articles.description: A blackmail racket exploiting CCTV footage from Uttar Pradesh's Purvanchal Expressway has led to multiple firings and arrests, exposing serious privacy breaches. The scandal has raised urgent questions about surveillance oversight and data security on the expressway.
